text: Crista-galli or crista-gallii, hen crest in Latin, may refer to: * Erythrina crista-galli, a flowering tree species native to Argentina, Uruguay, Brazil and Paraguay * Cynosurus crista-galli, a grass species in the genus Cynosurus * Nephrophyllidium crista-galli, a plant species * Polylepis crista-galli, a plant species endemic to Bolivia * Tillandsia crista-gallii, a plant species endemic to Mexico ==See also== * Crista (disambiguation) *Crista galli * Galli
title: Crista-galli
